card.name: Last Dream
card.description: Give all ally monsters +1/+1. If you have 1 {{HP}}, give them +7/+7 instead.

description.now: Give all ally monsters +1/+1. If you have 1 {{HP}}, give them +7/+7 instead.
description.prev: Summon the next {{TRIBE:LOST_SOUL|1}} with {{KW:HASTE}}. Then, if you have 15 {{HP}} or less, give all ally monsters +1/+1.
